definition: favoring or practicing capitalism, a person who invests capital in a business (especially a large business)
details:
adjective
- favoring or practicing capitalism
= synonyms: capitalistic
- of or relating to capitalism or capitalists
= example: of or relating to capitalism or capitalists
= synonyms: capitalistic
noun
- a person who invests capital in a business (especially a large business)
- a conservative advocate of capitalism
